subtitleNullable: Use parquet instead of csv for fast data loading and low memory use!
descriptionNullable:
Parquet format of the Corporación Favorita Grocery Sales Forecasting dataset 🥕🍅 (https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/favorita-grocery-sales-forecasting)

Used pyarrow(https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/index.html) as engine to encode. Please use `engine='pyarrow'` while decoding using `read_parquet` with pandas.
title: Grocery sales forecasting parquet
subtitle: Use parquet instead of csv for fast data loading and low memory use!
description:
Parquet format of the Corporación Favorita Grocery Sales Forecasting dataset 🥕🍅 (https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/favorita-grocery-sales-forecasting)

Used pyarrow(https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/index.html) as engine to encode. Please use `engine='pyarrow'` while decoding using `read_parquet` with pandas.
